        Constructor with the same parameters as in Res
        Parameters:
        owner - used model
        name - as in Res
        sortOrder - of inout queue possible values: ProcessQueueAnimation.FIFO ProcessQueueAnimation.LIFO
        qCapacity - capacity of input queue
        capacity - No of resources available in resource pool
        showInReport - as in Res
        showInTrace - as in Res

        create animation with full parameterization
        Parameters:
        pos - middle point of animation object

        resourceType - resourceTypeName (only for information, its no Id)
        showInAnimation - switch animation on or off

      • provide

        public boolean provide(EntityBasicAnimation proc,
                       int needRes)
        Entity proc need needRes resources to process. It want to move into input queue and wait to processing.
        Parameters:
        proc -
        needRes -
        Returns:
        true: its moved in input queue false: its rejected

      • takeBack

        public void takeBack(EntityBasicAnimation proc,
                     int takeBackRes)
        proc is in processing and gives resources back. when all resources are given back, it leaves the resource pool.
        Parameters:
        proc -
        takeBackRes -
